meanings.definition: The quality or state of being huge.
meanings.sent1: The hugeness of the elephant amazed the children at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The hugeness of the mountain made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent3: The hugeness of the ice cream cone made it impossible to finish in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: The hugeness of the task ahead seemed insurmountable.
meanings.sent5: The hugeness of the whale in the ocean was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The extent or amount of something that is huge.
meanings.sent1: The hugeness of the cake surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The hugeness of the crowd at the concert made it hard to see the stage.
meanings.sent3: The hugeness of the pizza slice was comically larger than the plate.
meanings.sent4: The hugeness of the tree's shadow stretched across the entire yard.
meanings.sent5: The hugeness of the library collection was overwhelming but exciting for book lovers.
